name: mongodb-course
description: - Unit 01: Getting Started with MongoDB Atlas, the Developer Data Platform - Unit 02: Overview of MongoDB and the Document Model - Unit 03: Connecting to a MongoDB Database - Unit 04: MongoDB CRUD Operations: Insert and Find Documents - Unit 05: MongoDB CRUD: Replace and Delete - Unit 06: MongoDB CRUD Operations: Modifying Query Results - Unit 07: MongoDB Aggregation - Unit 08: MongoDB Indexing - Unit 09: MongoDB Atlas Search - Unit 10: Introduction to MongoDB Data Modeling - Unit 11: MongoDB Transactions
